item.title: Request To Webdevs: Include IP/User-Agent Info In Forgot Password Email
item.description: The Forgot password email template has been the same for more than a decade. It is time to include more information in the email.

item.title: iCloud Gotchas
item.description: Integrating iCloud with core data was easy when I found this tutorial, but I ran into few issues while implementing and testing it on devices.
